activities:
Foresight Group is a technology solution provider for pharmaceutical 
companies, providing global hosting solutions in the area of clinical and
post-marketing safety surveillance, risk management and compliance.
contacttitle1: Partner in charge of hosting and managed services
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
orgverification: Foresight uses its in house Quality Assurance
personaldata: Global Pharmacovigilance data entered by Foresight's client's and stored in our encrypted database
recoursemech:
Foresight serves global Pharmaceutical companies as a data hosting
provider and is committed to work with European regulators on any
privacy complaints, i.e., European Union data protection authorities (EU DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
